#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This project is a Patch/Fork to 

Webcalendar Patch

https://sourceforge.net/projects/webcalendar
http://www.k5n.us/webcalendar.php


= Details =

I took Version 1.23 and
  * Did a lot changes to make it php 5.3 compatible
  * add a extended version of report generation to produce output formats in "html--parts" for other websites to display calendar events
  

= Reports =

Added option to create RSS, html-part and HTML
